name: Verify Program, Market Segment disabled on Renewal transaction

testSteps.description: 1: Verify Program, Market Segment disabled on Renewal transaction ({Program=MailEx Custom Critical, MarketSegment=MailEx Custom Critical})

children.description: Given underwriter has ability to create policy
And selects Program 'MailEx Custom Critical' and Market segment 'MailEx Custom Critical'
And underwriter creates and books policy
And underwriter is on home page
When underwriter selects Renew transaction on policy
Then Program and Market Segment should be disable

testSteps.description: 2: Verify Program, Market Segment disabled on Renewal transaction ({Program=Amazon, MarketSegment=Amazon})

children.description: Given underwriter has ability to create policy
And selects Program 'Amazon' and Market segment 'Amazon'
And underwriter creates and books policy
And underwriter is on home page
When underwriter selects Renew transaction on policy
Then Program and Market Segment should be disable

userStory.storyName: Renewal term should be displayed as Issued status until prior term expiresﾠ(PI-2314)

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given underwriter has ability to create policy
And selects Program '<Program>' and Market segment '<MarketSegment>'
And underwriter creates and books policy
And underwriter is on home page
And underwriter opens newly created 'policy'
When underwriter selects Renew transaction on policy
Then Program and Market Segment should be disable
